title: The Epic Bounty for 'Red Dead Redemption II'
description:
The highly anticipated 'Red Dead Redemption 2' was released Friday. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Chris Palmeri about the million-dollar bounty the game's creators are set to make as well as the state of the gaming industry, which is expected to bring in upwards of $140 billion this year. 
FOLLOW UP
 Chris's latest report: How to Make More Cash From One Game Than 10 James Bond Films
You can follow Chris at: @chrispalmeri
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
itunes:author: Bloomberg
itunes:subtitle: with Chris Palmeri (Bloomberg News)
